text: Akarontaṃ kho pana maṃ pāpakammaṃ kuto dukkhaṃ phusissatī ti ayamassa tatiyo assāso adhigato hoti
edit: Akarontaṃ kho pana maṃ pāpakammaṃ kuto dukkhaṃ phusissatī ti ayamassa tatiyo assāso adhigato hoti

translations.transtext: [and] I do not intend the evil action for anybody, how will suffering reach me who do no [such an action]? This is the third obtained consolation.
